name: The casino dice
description:
Game made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2022

The theme was : Roll The Dices

     Game about a dice trying to get money the quickest way possible in one day, but ever time he interacts with the world, his status change....

    Your cassino is almost being closed, you need to pay the rent, bills and buy everthing you could imagine to increase your popularity

    Musics : David Luong Memoir Of Summer, Halos of Eternity, Pathway to Haven.
